tut.trans: Bạn có thể mua các mặt hàng buff toàn cầu ở đây
tut.eng: You can purchase global buff items here

canAccessError.trans: You need at least level 5 to access the unit exchange
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access unit exchange

tut.trans: If you like the game, please consider a donation :)
tut.eng: If you liked the game, please consider donation :)

canAccessError.trans: You need at least level 5 to access the cosmetic merchant
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access cosmetic merchant

tut.trans: You can use your acquired Caches to print new equipment here
tut.eng: You can use your Cache to print new equipment here

tut.trans:
To progress to the next area, you need to get Secret Key Fragments from dungeons, 
        and use the Terminal to Brute Force a key for the next area
tut.eng:
To progress to the next area, you need to use get Secret Key Fragments from dungeons, 
        and use the Terminal to Brute Force the key for next area

description.trans: This is your personal computer. Although a little outdated, it can get the job done with enough patience
description.eng: Your personal computer, although it's a little outdated, it can get the job done with enough patience

canAccessError.trans: You need at least level 5 to access terminal
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access terminal

canAccessError.trans: You need at least level 5 to access the bank
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access bank

description.trans: A workbench with the necessary tools to allow you to tinker with your equipment.
description.eng: A workbench with the necessary tools allows you to tinker with your equipment.

name.trans: Bài đăng giao dịch của Lee

description.trans: Một cửa hàng giao dịch gia đình cho phép bạn giao dịch với những gì họ đã tìm thấy trong khi nhặt rác
description.eng: A family run trading shop that lets you trade with what they have found while scavenging

canAccessError.trans: You need at least level 10 to access merchant
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 10 to access merchant

description.trans: Tái chế hoàn toàn tự động, có khả năng tái chế các mặt hàng vào dạng phế liệu cơ bản của họ
description.eng: Fully automated recycler, capable of recycling items to their basic scrap form

description.trans:
[Central Hub]
        One of the busiest cities on the continent. Here you can find all sorts of people from around the globe.
description.eng:
[Central Hub]
        One of the busiest cities in the continent. Here you can find all sorts of people from around the globe.

name.trans: Go to Hyper Train Central Station
name.eng: Go to Hyper Train Central Station

tut.trans: Bắt đầu cuộc phiêu lưu của bạn cho Opic Loot ở đây
tut.eng: Start your adventure for epic loot here

description.trans: Đi đến Ga Trung tâm Hyper Train
description.eng: Go to Hyper Train Central Station

name.trans: Đi đến khu thương mại Shangri-La

tut.trans: Bạn có thể hoàn thành công việc AFK để tăng kỹ năng của mình ở đây
tut.eng: You can complete AFK jobs to increase your skills here

name.trans: Đi đến phố thị trường Shangri-La

tut.trans: Bạn có thể bán hoặc mua các mặt hàng từ những người chơi khác ở đây
tut.eng: You can sell or buy items from other players here

description.trans:
[Job Hub]
        There are many shops and businesses, and it is the perfect location to try out your skills.
description.eng:
[Job Hub]
        Here are many shops and businesses reside. The perfect location to hone and refine your skills.

name.trans: Quay trở lại trung tâm thành phố Shangri-La

description.trans:
[Chợ người chơi] 
         Chợ chợ nổi tiếng ở Shangri-La. Tải các quầy hàng của thị trường lấp đầy đường phố. 
         Có lẽ bạn có thể tìm thấy một cái gì đó bạn cần hoặc thiết lập tự cửa hàng.
description.eng:
[Player Market]
        The famous market street in Shangri-La. Loads of market stalls fill the street.
        Maybe you can find something you need or set up shop yourself.

name.trans: Quay trở lại trung tâm thành phố Shangri-La

description.trans:
[Adventure]
        Using the hyperloop, you can travel at super speed across the continent with ease.
description.eng:
[Adventure]
        Using the hyperloop, you can travel at supersonic speed across the continent with ease.

name.trans: Trở về trung tâm thành phố

description.trans: Quay trở lại ${mainHubName}
description.eng: Return to ${mainHubName}

description.trans: Quay trở lại ${segmentStationName}
description.eng: return to ${segmentStationName}

description.trans: Quay trở lại Ga siêu tốc
description.eng: Return to Hyper Train Station

description.trans:
Gather all 3 unique Key Fragments from the Dungeons for each zone in the previous station, 
                    then go to [Terminal] at City Center [Hub] to brute-force (Craft) the key required to unlock this area
description.eng:
Gather all 3 different Key Fragments from Dungeons in each 3 zones in previous station, 
                    then go to [Terminal] at City Center [Hub] to brute-force (Craft) the key required to unlock this area

tut.trans: Start with the level 1 to 10 area
Continue here to fight a level 1 enemy
tut.eng: Continue here to fight level 1 enemy

description.trans: Chuyển đến ${zoneName}
description.eng: Go to ${zoneName}

description.trans: Cấp độ ${segment} đến ${segmentMaxLevel}
description.eng: Level ${segment} to ${segmentMaxLevel}

description.trans:
[Băng nhóm] 
         Trụ sở chính cho bạn và các thành viên băng đảng của bạn lập kế hoạch và thực hiện thao tác tiếp theo của bạn
description.eng:
[Gang]
        The headquarters for you and your gang members to plan and execute your next operation

cantEnterError.trans: You need to join a gain to enter this area
cantEnterError.eng: You need to join a gang to enter this area

description.trans: A shard that contains someone's memories and experiences. If used, you may gain ${levelName} experience from this
description.eng: A shard that contains someone's memory and experience. If used you may gain ${levelName} experience from this

description.trans:
Secret key Fragment. Used to brute-force a secret key.
                                Use the Terminal at City Center [Hub] to brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal and challenge).
                                When you have acquired the 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) the key to the next area
description.eng:
A secret key Fragment used to brute-force a secret key.
                                Use the Terminal at city center [Hub] to brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal or challenge),
                                when you acquired 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) a key to the next area

description.trans:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used for Molecular 3D Printing. 
                    You can create a ${typeName} with the [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: The level of the item you get from printing is determined by your Printing Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less and are useful to level up your Printing Rank
description.eng:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used for Molecular 3D Printing, 
                    You can create a ${typeName} with the [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: The level of item you get from printing is determined by your Printing Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less and useful to level up your Printing Rank

description.trans: Do you have a headache? Use Pain Away™ to relieve your pain!
description.eng: Do you have headache? Use Pain Away™ to relieve your pain!

name.trans: Bot sửa chữa nano xuống cấp

description.trans: Một bot sửa chữa nano cũ, thường được sử dụng để sửa chữa các thiết bị công nghệ nhỏ.
description.eng: An old nano repair bot, usually used to repair small tech devices.

name.trans: Bot nano do bị thoái hóa

description.trans: An old nano medic bot. Inject it to cure any(*conditions apply) injury!
description.eng: Old nano medic bot is used to cure any (*conditions apply) injury!

description.trans: inject it to cure any (*conditions apply) injury!
description.eng: Inject it to cure any(*conditions apply) injury!

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. Capable of patching injuries while in combat.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They are capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are used in the military. They are capable of patching injuries while in combat.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They're capable of patching injuries while in combat.

name.trans: Bot Nano Medic chất lượng cao

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are for advanced military use. Capable of patching up injuries in combat situations.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They're capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are for advanced military use. Capable of patching up injuries in combat situations.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They're capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Do you and your friend have headaches? Use Pain Away Spray™ to relieve your pain!
description.eng: Do you and your friends both have headaches? Use Pain Away Spray™ to relief your pain!

description.trans: An old repair drone, capable of repairing or healing nearby players.
description.eng: Old repair drone, capable of repairing or heal nearby players

description.trans: An old nano medic drone, capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: Old nano drone, capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of military-grade nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of military nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

name.trans: Bộ phận công nghệ y tế

description.trans: Bits and pieces of used medical tech. Can be used to craft healing items if you know how.
description.eng: Bits and pieces of used medical tech. This can be used to craft healing items if you understand how

description.trans: Memory bank containing someone's memories. If used, you may gain experience from this.
description.eng: Memory bank contains someone's memory. If used you may gain experience from this

description.trans:
Can be used as dedicated hardware for Bitcoin mining. 
        However, due to overclocking, the processor will easily burn out.
        You may use this to mine Bitcoin at [JOB HUB]
description.eng:
Can be used as a dedicated hardware for BitCoin mining, 
        however due to overclocking, the processor is easily burntout,
        You may use this to mine BitCoin at [JOB HUB]

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for a short period of time.
        
        When used, gives a Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks at +5% speed for 10 minutes (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for short period of time.
        
        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks in +5% speed for 10 minutes (stackable)

name.trans: Máy phát tăng tốc Synaptic hiếm

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for a short period of time.
        
        When used, gives a Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks at +40% speed for 20 minutes (stackable x2)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for short period of time.
        
        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks in +40% speed for 20 minutes (stackable)

name.trans: Máy phát Tối ưu hóa Cortex phía trước

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, enhancing their Frontal Cortex integration with cyberwares installed, thus increasing the memory capability of the user.

        When used, gives a Global Buff to all players online, increasing EXP gained to 180% for 20 minutes
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, enhancing their Frontal Cortex integration with cyberwares installed, thus increasing memory capability of the user.

        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, increase EXP gained to 180% for 20 minutes

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, augments their transaction algorithm temporarily, allowing user to receive bonus  ${Config.CURRENCY_NAME}.

        When used, gives a Global Buff to all players online, increases Bitcoin gained by 40% for 20 minutes (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, argument their transaction algorithm temporary, allowing user to receive bonus  ${Config.CURRENCY_NAME}.

        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, increase BitCoin gained by 40% for 20 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
Commercially used Neural Processing Unit (NPU). Comes with general purpose AI. 
        You can use this to deploy a bot that farms dungeons for you.
description.eng:
Commercially used Neural Processing Unit (NPU). Comes with general purpose AI. 
        You can use this to deploy a farming bot to dungeon for you.

description.trans: A portable energy storage device. Can be used as consumable ammo for your Special Weapons
description.eng: Portable energy storage device, it can be used as consumable ammo for your Special Weapons

description.trans:
A high-tech, miniaturized, one-time use, antimatter energy generator. 
        This item produces enormous amounts of power. You can use this as ammunition for your Destructive Weapon.
description.eng:
High-tech, miniaturized, one-time use, antimatter energy generator. 
        This item produces enormous amounts of power. You can use this as ammunition for your destructive weapon.

name.trans: Phụ tùng công nghệ đạn dược

description.trans:
Ammunition tech parts commonly found circulating the black market. 
        You can use these to craft ammunition if you know how.
description.eng:
Ammunition tech parts, These can be commonly found circulating the black market. 
        You can use these to craft ammunition if you understand how.

name.trans: Phụ tùng công nghệ đạn dược quân sự

description.trans: Military-grade ammunition tech parts, commonly used by the government, military and the elites. Can be used to craft into ammunition if you know how.
description.eng: Military grade ammunition tech parts, commonly used by government, military and the elites,can be used to craft into usable Ammo if you have the know-how

description.trans:
Technology scrap from disassembled equipment. This can be reverse engineered to gain printing xp. 
        You can perform reverse engineering in the Job Hub.
description.eng:
Technology scrap from disassembled equipment, this can be reverse engineered to gain printing xp. 
        You can perform reverse engineering in the Job Hub.

description.trans:
A reinforced container with a biometric encryption lock. It seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on outdated firmware, so an exploit is possible. Go to [Terminal] to unlock this container
description.eng:
A reinforced container with biometric encryption lock, it seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on out-dated firmware, where an exploit is possible, go to [Terminal] to unlock this container

description.trans:
A reinforced container with a biometric encryption lock. It seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on outdated firmware, so an exploit is possible. Go to [Terminal] to unlock this container
description.eng:
A reinforced container with biometric encryption lock, it seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on out-dated firmware, where an exploit is possible, go to [Terminal] to unlock this container

description.trans:
A reinforced container with a biometric encryption lock. It seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on outdated firmware, so an exploit is possible. Go to [Terminal] to unlock this container
description.eng:
A reinforced container with biometric encryption lock, it seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on out-dated firmware, where an exploit is possible, go to [Terminal] to unlock this container

name.trans: Truyền lệnh xâm lược băng đảng

description.trans:
A simple transmitter device that can be bound to your gang encrypted channel and give an invasion order.
        This item is required to activate Gang Dungeons
description.eng:
A simple transmitter device that can be bind to your gang encrypted channel and give out invasion order.
        This item is required to activate Gang Dungeons

description.trans:
Contains various items and resources for a gang to stay functional,
        Click use to send it to your gang headquarters
description.eng:
Contains misc items and resources for a gang to stay functional,
        Click use to send it to your gang headquarters

name.trans: Bộ nhớ băng đảng mã hóa

description.trans:
A memory shard contains encrypted gang secrets, 
        decrypt this in your gang headquarter to gain useful intel (requires user to be in a gang)
description.eng:
A memory shard contains encrypted gang secrets, 
        decrypt this in your gang headquarters to gain useful intel (requires to be in a gang)

description.trans: Một bộ nhớ bảng nhớ chợ đen chứa thuật toán và sơ đồ được mã hóa cao rất quan trọng trong quá trình nâng cấp thiết bị
description.eng: A black market memory shard contains highly encrypted algorithm and schematic that is crucial in the process of upgrading equipments

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advanced AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 5% (stackable) for 5 minutes.
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 5% (stackable) for 5 minutes.

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advanced AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 10% (stackable) for 5 minutes.
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 10% (stackable) for 5 minutes.

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advanced AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% (stackable) for 5 minutes. This effect will apply to all players online
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% (stackable) for 5 minutes. This effect will apply to all players online

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advanced AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 100% (stackable) for 5 minutes. This effect will apply to all players online
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 100% (stackable) for 5 minutes. This effect will apply to all players online

name.trans: Hiệu chuẩn an toàn Nano Bots

description.trans:
Experimental nano machines designed to reduce and negate the destructive effect when failing calibration, 
        when this is activated, all calibration fails will not destroy the item for 5 minutes
description.eng:
Experimental nano machines designed to reduces and negate the destructive effect when failing calibration, 
        when this is activated, all calibration fails will not destroy the item for 5 minutes

description.trans:
A forgotten ancient pouch, 
        there is a weird cartoon frog with a big mouth and red lips drawn on the side of it,
        the meaning of the ancient ominous drawing is unknown, but it is handy to keep some small objects in.
        Increases inventory space when equipped.
description.eng:
A forgotten ancient pouch, 
        there is a weird cartoon frog with big mouth and red lips drawing at the side of it,
        the meaning of the ancient ominous drawing is unknown, but it is handy for keep some small object in it.
        increase inventory space when equipped.

description.trans:
Cool and fashionable Fanny Pack, signed by a legend called The Rock himself from decades ago.
        Increases inventory space when equipped.
description.eng:
Cool and fashionable Fanny Pack, signed by a legend called The Rock himself from decades ago.
        increase inventory space when equipped.

description.trans:
An old Kindergarten looking Purple 'Explorer' Backpack, it has a name tag with the previous owner's name "Dora" written on it, you look fabulous wearing it.
        Increases inventory space when equipped
description.eng:
An old Kindergarten looking Purple 'Explorer' Backpack, it has a name tag with the previous owner's name "Dora" written on it, you look fabulous wearing it.
        increase inventory space when equipped

name.trans: Trường hợp văn phòng nhân viên

description.trans:
A standard issue office case, it has a label in white print with "Arasaka" on it, 
        while it is spacious and has some high tech compartments and slots for document storage, it is not very suitable for carrying weapons
        Increases inventory space when equipped
description.eng:
An standard issue office case, it has a label with whit print with "Arasaka" on it, 
        while it is specious and has some high tech compartment and slots for document storage, it is not not very suitable for carrying weapons
        increase inventory space when equipped

name.trans: Đơn vị lưu trữ tự trị

description.trans:
A military used bot designed to carry your equipment and follow you autonomously,
        with its six strong legs that imitate the movement of spiders and an advanced onboard AI, 
        it can follow you swiftly and quietly while it avoids getting in the way of whatever mission you are performing
description.eng:
An military used bot designed to carry your equipments and follows you autonomously,
        with it's six strong legs that imitates the movement of spiders and a advance onboard AI, 
        it can follow you swiftly and quietly while it avoids get in the way of whatever mission you are performing

description.trans: Máy nano tiêm dành cho sử dụng quân sự trước, có khả năng vá chấn thương trong tình huống chiến đấu
description.eng: injectable nano machines that is for advance military use, capable of patching injury in combat situation

description.trans: Máy nano tiêm dành cho sử dụng quân sự trước, có khả năng vá chấn thương trong tình huống chiến đấu
description.eng: injectable nano machines that is for advance military use, capable of patching injury in combat situation

description.trans: Có khả năng gửi hàng ngàn máy Nano tiên tiến để chữa lành những người chơi gần đó
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Có khả năng gửi hàng ngàn máy Nano tiên tiến để chữa lành những người chơi gần đó
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% for 5 minutes. this only affect yourself.
        You can calibrate items in your Gang Headquarter, you must join or start a gang first.
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% for 5 minutes. this only affect yourself.
        You can calibrate items in your Gang Headquarters, you must join or start a gang first.

description.trans:
Một mô-đun khai thác chặn các gói trò chuyện toàn cầu và sửa đổi nó, thực hiện cuộc tấn công giữa người đàn ông. 
         Biến đổi tất cả các bài phát biểu tại trò chuyện toàn cầu để cướp biển nói. Tác dụng này tất cả người chơi trong 10 phút
description.eng:
A exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performing Man-In-The-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat to Pirate Speak. This effects all players for 10 minutes

description.trans:
Một mô-đun khai thác chặn các gói trò chuyện toàn cầu và sửa đổi nó, thực hiện cuộc tấn công giữa người đàn ông. 
         Chuyển đổi tất cả các bài phát biểu tại trò chuyện toàn cầu thành L33T SP34K. Tác dụng này tất cả người chơi trong 10 phút
description.eng:
A exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performing Man-In-The-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat to l33t Sp34k. This effects all players for 10 minutes

description.trans:
Một moduwe expwoit mà chúng tôi có thể chấp nhận các gói trò chuyện Gwobaw và sửa đổi nó, Pewfowming man-in-the-middwe tấn công. 
          TWANSFOWMS AWW Lời nói tại Gwobaw Chat đến UWU Nói. Hiệu ứng này aww pwayews fow 10 phút
description.eng:
A expwoit moduwe that intewcepts gwobaw chat packages and modifies it, pewfowming man-in-the-middwe attack.
         twansfowms aww speech at gwobaw chat to uwu speak. This effects aww pwayews fow 10 minutes

name.trans: Thiết lập lại nhà máy shard

description.trans: Một shard lưu trữ cài đặt và thuật toán mặc định cho các thiết bị, điều này được sử dụng để thiết lập lại nhà máy Thiết bị của bạn
description.eng: A shard stores default settings and algorithm for equipments, this is used for factory-resetting your equipments

description.trans:
Khi được sử dụng, bỏ qua 60 phút về các nhiệm vụ AFK. 
         phải được sử dụng tại màn hình AFK
description.eng:
When used, skip 60 minutes on AFK tasks.
        must be used at AFK screen

description.trans:
Bạn có một số tình yêu, và bạn có được một số tình yêu! Mọi người đều có một số tình yêu !. 
         Khi sử dụng mọi người yêu nhau 
         Tác dụng này tất cả người chơi fow 10 phút
description.eng:
You get some love, and you get some love! everyone gets some love!.
        When used everyone loves each other
        This effects all players fow 10 minutes

description.trans:
Lo lắng người anh lớn theo dõi bạn trong khi bạn duyệt không gian mạng? 
         Các liên lạc của bạn luôn bị hack bởi các cuộc tấn công độc hại? 
         Sử dụng VPN CyberTunnel để bảo vệ và mã hóa trải nghiệm Netrucky của bạn! 
        
         Sau khi kích hoạt, bỏ qua bất kỳ khai thác trò chuyện nào trong 1 giờ
description.eng:
Worried the Big Brother spying on you while you browse the cyberspace?
        your intercoms always get hacked by malicious attacks? 
        use CyberTunnel VPN to protect and encrypt your netrunning experience! 
        
        Once activated, ignores any chat exploit for 1 hour

description.trans:
[AFK Exp Farm]
        Deploys an AI to clear dungeons for you. This will use up an AI Core; they usually only manage one trip.
description.eng:
[AFK Exp Farm]
        Deploys an AI to dungeon for you. This will use up an AI Core, they usually only just manage the one trip.

tut.trans: You can use your AI Cores to Auto-Farm enemies while you are AFK
tut.eng: You can use your AI Core to Auto-Farm enemies while you AFK

description.trans: Improve your Printing Rank without sacrificing tech scrap, helping to increase the level of your prints.
description.eng: Improve Printing Rank without sacrificing tech scrap, this may help to increase the level of your prints.

name.trans: Hack một phòng khám mod cơ thể

description.trans: Tải xuống dữ liệu hữu ích từ một phòng khám mod cơ thể địa phương để thủ công các bot y tế chất lượng cao hơn và máy bay không người lái.
description.eng: Download useful data from a local body mod clinic to craft higher quality medical bots and drones.

description.trans: Tinker with ammunition to find more effective ways of crafting it.
description.eng: Tinker with ammunition, to find more effective ways of crafting it.

name.trans: Kỹ sư đảo ngược phế liệu

description.trans:
Reverse engineer tech scrap to improve your Printing Rank. 
        You’ll need to sacrifice some of your tech scrap.
description.eng:
Reverse engineer tech scrap to improve your Print Rank. 
        You’ll need to sacrifice some of your tech scrap.

description.trans: Engaging in crypto mining will earn you Bitcoins. However, due to the intense use of the Hash Processors, the Quantum Processing Unit, otherwise known as the QPU, will often burn out.
description.eng: Engaging in crypto mining will earn you Bitcoins, however due to the intense use of the Hash Processors, the Quantum Processing Unit, otherwise known as the QPU, will often burn out.

description.trans:
[Thu thập tài nguyên AFK] 
                     Tìm kiếm xung quanh trong ${zoneName} và nhặt rác cho các mục hữu ích. 
                     Ai biết, có lẽ bạn sẽ gặp may mắn!
description.eng:
[AFK Resource Gather]
                    Search around in ${zoneName} and scavenge for useful items.
                    Who knows, maybe you'll get lucky!

description.trans: Help gather and manage needed resources for your clan
description.eng: Help gather and manage needed resources for your gang

description.trans: Giải mã bộ nhớ Shard bạn tìm thấy để lấy Intel hữu ích
description.eng: Decrypt memory shard you found to retrieve useful intel

name.trans: Củng cố nghề nghiệp tại Shangri-La

description.trans: Giúp củng cố và thiết lập kiểm soát lớn hơn của thành phố Shangri-La.
description.eng: Help reinforce and establish greater control of Shangri-la city.

description.trans:
Konnichiwa!! ^___^
        Come play the MEGA Pachinko! With chance to win HUGE EPIC rewards
        only 10000 btc per session, LIMITED TIME OFFER!!! <3<3<3
        ##Special thanks for Militech for sponsoring this event##
description.eng:
Konnichiwa!! ^___^
        Come play the MEGA Pachinko! With chance to win HUGE EPIC rewards
        only 5000 btc per session, LIMITED TIME OFFER!!! <3<3<3
        ##Special thanks for Militech for sponsoring this event##

description.trans: Các quan chức chính phủ hối lộ và SLPD và thu phí bảo vệ từ chủ doanh nghiệp và công dân tại Shangri-LAH. Có lẽ bạn sẽ nhận được một số mục Epic từ họ? (Top hai băng đảng độc quyền)
description.eng: Bribe Government officials and SLPD and Collect Protection Fees from business owner and citizens in Shangri-lah. maybe you will get some EPIC items from them? (Top Two Gang Exclusive)

description.trans:
Khởi chạy một cuộc tấn công hợp tác trong không gian mạng nhắm vào pháo đài dữ liệu Shangri-La 
         Nếu tấn công là thành công, có thể buộc pháo đài dữ liệu truyền các khai thác cho tất cả người dùng theo dõi tính mạng
description.eng:
Launch a collaborated attack in cyberspace targeting the Shangri-La Data Fortress
        if attack were to succeed its possible to force the Data Fortress to transmit exploits to all cybernetically connected users

tut.trans:
Dive into a dungeon to get even more exp and loot!
                        Remember to buy some healing items! You don"t regen after battle in dungeons
tut.eng:
Are you ready? you can test your strength out with normal dungeon, the easiest one.
                        Remember to bring healing item! you won't heal after fights in dungeon

description.trans:
Cấp độ khuyến nghị: ${maxLevel} + Với Co-op 
                     ${expMultiplier} x Thêm exp! 
                     Challenge Mode Dungeon, Extra Loot và Exp. 
                     DROPS ${keyFragmentDisplayName} 
                     Không nên nhập nếu trình độ của bạn quá thấp
description.eng:
Recommended Level:　${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x more EXP!
                    Challenge mode dungeon, extra loot and exp.
                    Drops ${keyFragmentDisplayName}
                    Not advised to enter if your level is too low

tut.trans:
Are you strong enough? Try out a Challenge Dungeon.
                        There is a strong boss and tons of loot at the end waiting for you!
                        It's recommended to attempt this with other players.
tut.eng:
Are you strong enough? try it out on Challenge Dungeon,
                        there is a strong boss and tons of loot at the end waiting for you!
                        Its recommended to attempt this with other players.

description.trans:
Recommended Level:　${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x more EXP!
                    Gang mode dungeon, extra loot and exp. 
                    Boss drops are rare+ 
                    Not advised to enter if your level is too low
description.eng:
Recommended Level:　${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${2.3}x more EXP! and 4~5x stronger enemies!
                    Gang mode dungeon, extra loot and exp.
                    *Not for the faint of heart*

buttonTut.trans:
Bạn có nghĩ rằng bạn đủ mạnh mẽ? Lấy kẻ thù mạnh mẽ hơn trong ngục tối! 
                         Nhớ mua một số mặt hàng chữa bệnh! bạn sẽ không regen sau trận chiến trong ngục tối
buttonTut.eng:
Do you think you are strong enough? take on stronger enemies in dungeon!
                        remember to buy some healing item! you won't regen after battle in dungeon

progression.eng:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName}.
                These are used to create the key to the next zone.
                To craft the key, go to Terminal in [HUB]

description.trans:
Acquire each Key Fragment from their respective dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName}.
                These are used to create the key to the next zone.
                To craft the key, go to Terminal in [HUB]
description.eng:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName},
                these are used to create the key to next zone.
                To craft the key, go to terminal in [HUB]

subTitle.eng: gather the caches from enemies and dungeons to print your new weapons and armor

story.trans: Bạn tìm thấy một hộp an toàn bị khóa cũ, có vẻ như là một bài viết với một số văn bản được viết trên đó.
story.eng: You found an old locked safe box, there seems like a post-it with some text written on it.

noKeysSubtitle.eng: You can obtain secret keys from Dungeons

notUnlocked.eng: You have not unlocked this area yet

confirmation.trans:
Làm điều này sẽ thiết lập lại tất cả hiệu chuẩn trên mặt hàng của bạn. Nó cũng sẽ làm cho nó có thể giao dịch một lần nữa. 
       Bạn có chắc muốn tiếp tục?
confirmation.eng:
Doing this will reset all calibration on your item. It will also make it tradable again. 
      Are you sure you want to proceed?

confirmKickMember.eng: are you sure you want to kick this player from your gang?

description.trans: Nếu bạn có một phiếu giảm giá từ một trong các sự kiện của chúng tôi, bạn có thể yêu cầu nó ở đây.
description.eng: If you have a coupon from one of our events, you can claim it here.

placeholder.trans: Dán hoặc nhập phiếu giảm giá của bạn ở đây

title.trans: Bạn có chắc rằng bạn muốn xóa tài khoản của bạn? Điều này là không thể đảo ngược, tất cả thông tin tài khoản sẽ được gỡ bỏ.
title.eng: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This is irreversible, all account information will be removed.

cantEnterError.trans: You need at least level 2 to access the job hub
cantEnterError.eng: You need to be at least level 2 to access the job hub

subtile.trans: MMORPG dựa trên văn bản CyberPunk

description1.trans: CyberCode Online là một trò chơi trực tuyến, một tài khoản là cần thiết để lưu trữ dữ liệu trò chơi.
description1.eng: CyberCode Online is an online game, an account is needed to store game data.

description2.trans: Vui lòng đăng ký hoặc đăng nhập với tài khoản hiện có
description2.eng: please register or login with existing account

emptyError.trans: Vui lòng nhập tên nhân vật của bạn để tiếp tục.
emptyError.eng: Please enter your character name to continue.

description.trans: Bạn sẽ bị tắt tiếng nếu bạn sử dụng tên gây khó chịu hoặc không phù hợp.
description.eng: you will be muted if you use an offensive or inappropriate name.

    this effect will be applied to all players performing an AFK task
description.eng:
Global Skip allow you to skip the AFK waiting time, and finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied to all player performing AFK task

description.eng: Use one of your ${timeSkipItemName} to skip ${itemSkipMinutes} minutes

Global Skip allows you to skip the AFK waiting time and finish instantly.

description.eng:
Global Skip allow you to skip the AFK waiting time, and finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied to all players performing an AFK task

subtitle.trans: Join forces with other Netrunners to breach the SL-Data Fortress to grant all players a buff
subtitle.eng: Join forces with other Netrunners to breach the SL-Data Fortress to grant all players with buff

password.trans: Mật khẩu được bảo vệ ngục tối

des.trans: Trong ngục tối, bạn sẽ không lành sau mỗi cuộc chiến, và kẻ thù mạnh hơn, nhưng có nhiều exp và loot hơn
des.eng: In dungeons, you will not heal after each fight, and enemies are stronger, but there are more exp and loots

enemyIsDeadTitle.trans: Bạn không tìm thấy gì ở đây

noDungeon.trans: Hiện tại không có ngục tối công khai

desc.trans: Quét cho kẻ thù gần đó trên đường phố, kẻ thù bên ngoài ngục tối yếu hơn và dễ đánh bại hơn. Tuy nhiên, họ cũng giảm bớt exp
desc.eng: Scans for nearby enemies on the street, enemies outside dungeons are weaker and easier to defeat. However they also drop less exp

description.trans: Tăng sức khỏe tối đa

description.trans: Giảm sát thương lấy từ kẻ thù

description.trans: Directly influences the amount of damage you deal
description.eng: Directly influences the amount of damage dealt by you

description.trans: Chance of executing a critical attack, which deals more damage
description.eng: Chance of you executing a critical attack

description.trans: Influences the damage you deal when executing a critical attack
description.eng: Influence the critical attack damage you deal to the enemy

description.trans: Tăng khả năng khiên của bạn

description.trans: Cơ hội bạn trốn thoát khỏi một kẻ thù ngục tối

description.trans:
Chance of you stunning an enemy when dealing damage,

description.eng:
Chance of you stunning your enemy when dealing damage, 
    causing them not able to respond to your attack

description.eng: Chance of you dodging an enemies attack

description.trans: Influences the price when buying and selling from NPCs or stores.
description.eng: Influences the price when buying and selling from npc's or stores.

description.trans: Tăng khả năng kiểm kê
description.eng: Increases inventory capacity

description.trans: Increases damage by a percentage
description.eng: Increases damage by percentage

description.trans: Decreases damage received by a percentage
description.eng: Decreases damage received by percentage

description.trans: Giảm cơ hội bị sững sờ
description.eng: Decreases chance of getting stunned

description.trans: Increases strength of shield by a percentage
description.eng: Increase strength of shield by percentage

description.trans: Tăng hiệu lực của gót chân của bạn
description.eng: Increases the potency of your heals

description.trans: Reduces time required to complete an AFK task
description.eng: Reduce AFK task required time

description.trans: Increases EXP you receive
description.eng: Increase EXP you receive

description.trans: Increases Bitcoins you receive
description.eng: Increase Bitcoins you receive

description.trans: Năng lực sức khỏe tối đa

Đơn vị lưu trữ tự trị

priceConfirm.eng: You are selling ${amountStr} ${itemName}(s), at the price of ${priceStr} Per Item

totalConfirm.eng: If all items are sold, you will earn ${total} BitCoins

sellAmountModalTitle.eng: How many would you like to sell?

subTitle.trans: Congratulations, you have leveled up your ${levelName}!
subTitle.eng: Congratulation, you have leveled up your ${levelName}!

title1.trans: Tôi là Dexter, nhà phát triển của trò chơi này, và tôi hy vọng sẽ biết kinh nghiệm của bạn cho đến nay.
title1.eng: I'm Dexter, the developer of this game, and I hope to know your experience so far.

title2.trans: Bạn sẽ cho bao nhiêu ngôi sao?
title2.eng: How many stars would you give?

title.trans: Tôi rất xin lỗi, xin vui lòng cho tôi biết nơi tôi có thể cải thiện
title.eng: I am so sorry, please let me know where I can improve

title1.trans: Wow, cảm ơn rất nhiều! Tôi rất vinh dự, vui lòng làm cho nó chính thức bằng cách để chúng trên trang cửa hàng của chúng tôi :)
title1.eng: Wow, thanks so much! I'm honored, please make it official by leaving them on our store page :)

title2.trans: Your good review is going to help me very much and bring more players into our community!
title2.eng: Your good review is going to help me much and bring more players into our community!

localCombatButton.eng: Click here to scan for street enemies
